title: Section change
content: Recently they have allotted sections for 2nd sem but I don't like my classmates can I change my section regardless of branch? Let's say my branch is ec and I want to transfer to a section where all students are of cs branch but the syllabus is same regardless of branch.

comments.body: I went through the same thing in the second semester when I got put in a class with strangers while my friends from first sem got moved to another class. I talked to new people and made friends, what else do you do lmao. Itâ€™s literally just 1 semester. Your sections will change again after 2nd sem anyway.
Nah most of my classmates are in same section. That is why I said I hate them and I need new people. Only very selective people got transferred. I at least want to enjoy my 2nd sem with decent mates.
what do you hate so much about them
Just don't like them. Yk there are always some people that don't match your vibe. They do some cringey things which sometimes involve me and it irritates me.
Yo atp im also in same situation more friends better for u anyday
I just hope there are baddies in my class. Or else imma jump /s
